meta.name: note
meta.content: Not clear what the edition was

chapter.name: Saturday before Theophany
January 1: Circumcision of Our Lord Jesus Christ & Saint Basil The Great, Archbishop Of Cæsaria In Cappadocia
January 2: St. Sylvester, Pope of Rome
January 2: St. Seraphim, Wonderworker of Sarov
January 2: Holy Righteous Juliana Of Lazarevo
January 3: Holy Prophet Malachi & The Holy Martyr Gordius
January 4: Synaxis of the Seventy Apostles
January 5: Holy Martyrs Theopemptus & Theonas
January 5: Hours Chanted on the Eve of the Theophany of the Lord
January 6: Holy Theophany of our Lord
January 7: Holy, Glorious Prophet, Forerunner John the Baptist
January 8: Our Venerable Father George the Khozebite & Our Venerable Mother Domnica
January 8: Holy Hieromartyr Isidore & the 72 Martyred With Him For Orthodoxy, In Yuriev Of Estonia
January 9: Holy Martyr Polyeuctus of Melitene in Armenia
January 9: Saint Philip, Metropolitan of Moscow & All Russia, the New Confessor
January 10: Saint Gregory, Bishop Of Nyssa
January 10: Saint Theophanes, Recluse of Vyshensk
January 11: St. Theodosius the Cœnobiarch
January 12: Holy Martyr Tatiana
January 12: Saints Savva, First Archbishop & Teacher Of The Serbs
January 13: Martyrs Hermylus & Stratonicus
January 14: Apodosis Of Holy Theophany
January 15: Our Venerable Fathers Paul of Thebes & John the Hut-dweller
January 16: Precious Chains Of The Holy Pre-Eminent Apostle Peter
January 17: Venerable & God-Bearing Father Anthony The Great
January 18: Saints Athanasius & Cyril, Archbishops of Alexandria
January 19: Our Venerable Father Macarius the Egyptian
January 20: Our Venerable & God-bearing Father Euthymius the Great
January 21: Venerable Father Maximus the Confessor & of the Holy Martyr Neophytus
January 21: Our Venerable Father Maximus the Greek
January 21: Holy Martyr Agnes of Rome
January 22: Holy Martyr Alexander of Munich
Sunday of the New-Martyrs and Confessors of Russia
January 23: Holy Apostle Timothy & Venerable Martyr Anastasius the Persian
January 23: Holy Hieromartyr Clement, Bishop of Ancyra
January 24: Venerable Mother Xenia
January 24: Holy Xenia, Blessed in Christ, the Homeless Wanderer of Saint Petersburg
January 25: St. Gregory the Theologian, Archbishop of Constantinople
January 26: Our Venerable Father Xenophon of Constantinople, Mary, his wife, and their sons, Arcadius and John
January 27: Translation of the Relics of Our Father among the Saints, John Chrysostom, Archbishop of Constantinople
January 28: Our Venerable Father Ephraim the Syrian
January 28: Our Father among the Saints Isaac the Syrian, Bishop of Nineveh
January 29: Translation of the Relics of the Holy Hieromartyr Ignatius the God-bearer
January 30: Commemoration of Our Holy Fathers, the Great Hierarchs Basil the Great, Gregory the Theologian & John Chrysostom
January 31: Holy Wonder-workers & Unmercenary Physicians Cyrus & John
